item.title: Amy add a quote by Rich Burlew
item.description: "Sacrificing minions: is there any problem it CAN'T solve?" -- Rich Burlew

item.title: Amy add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "The difference between my darkness and your darkness is that I can look at my own badness in the face and accept its existence while you are busy covering your mirror with a white linen sheet. The difference between my sins and your sins is that when I sin I know I'm sinning while you have actually fallen prey to your own fabricated illusions. I am a siren, a mermaid; I know that I am beautiful while basking on the ocean's waves and I know that I can eat flesh and bones at the bottom of the sea. You are a white witch, a wizard; your spells are manipulations and your cauldron from hell yet you wrap yourself in white and wear a silver wig." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Amy add a quote by Lisa Papademetriou
item.description: "She swore vengeance on all men with dark hearts." -- Lisa Papademetriou

item.title: Amy add a quote by Aimee Bender
item.description: "I give boring people something to discuss over corn." -- Aimee Bender
